00001 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00002 ! Subroutine : PostStreamF
00003 ! Revision   : 1.0 (2008-06-15)

00033 
00034  SUBROUTINE PostStreamF
00035 
00036 ! Common Variables
00037  USE Domain,      ONLY : xl_f, xlg_f, xsize_f, xu_f, xug_f, yl_f, ylg_f, ysize_f, yu_f, yug_f
00038  USE FluidParams, ONLY : phi_f
00039  USE LBMParams,   ONLY : f
00040  USE MPIParams
00041  USE MPI
00042  IMPLICIT NONE
00043 
00044 ! Local Variables
00045  INTEGER :: count, i, j
00046  INTEGER :: MPI_ERR, MPI_REQ
00047  INTEGER :: status(MPI_STATUS_SIZE)
00048 
00049 !-------- Save outward pointing values of f ------------------------------------
00050 ! X DIRECTION
00051  count = 1
00052  DO j = yl_f, yu_f
00053    f_west_snd(count) = f(xlg_f,j,3)
00054    f_east_snd(count) = f(xug_f,j,1)
00055    count = count + 1
00056  END DO
00057 
00058 ! Y DIRECTION
00059  count = 1
00060  DO i = xl_f, xu_f
00061    f_south_snd(count) = f(i,ylg_f,4)
00062    f_north_snd(count) = f(i,yug_f,2)
00063    count = count + 1
00064  END DO
00065 
00066 !-------- Exchange f values using MPI calls ------------------------------------
00067 ! X DIRECTION
00068  CALL MPI_IRECV(f_east_rcv, xsize_f, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, east, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00069  CALL MPI_SEND( f_west_snd, xsize_f, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, west, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00070  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00071 
00072  CALL MPI_IRECV(f_west_rcv, xsize_f, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, west, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00073  CALL MPI_SEND( f_east_snd, xsize_f, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, east, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00074  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00075 
00076 ! Y DIRECTION
00077  CALL MPI_IRECV(f_north_rcv, ysize_f, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, north, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00078  CALL MPI_SEND( f_south_snd, ysize_f, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, south, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00079  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00080 
00081  CALL MPI_IRECV(f_south_rcv, ysize_f, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, south, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00082  CALL MPI_SEND( f_north_snd, ysize_f, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, north, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00083  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00084 
00085 
00086 !-------- Update inward components of f in the real nodes ----------------------
00087 ! X DIRECTION
00088  count = 1
00089  DO j = yl_f, yu_f
00090    f(xu_f,j,3) = f_east_rcv(count)
00091    f(xl_f,j,1) = f_west_rcv(count)
00092    count = count + 1
00093  END DO
00094 
00095 ! Y DIRECTION
00096  count = 1
00097  DO i = xl_f, xu_f
00098    f(i,yu_f,4) = f_north_rcv(count)
00099    f(i,yl_f,2) = f_south_rcv(count)
00100    count = count + 1
00101  END DO
00102 
00103 !-------- Update the order parameter with the new f values ---------------------
00104  DO j = yl_f, yu_f
00105    DO i = xl_f, xu_f
00106      phi_f(i,j) = f(i,j,0) + f(i,j,1) + f(i,j,2) + f(i,j,3) + f(i,j,4)
00107    END DO
00108  END DO
00109 
00110 !-------- Exchange and update phi for all ghost nodes --------------------------
00111 ! X DIRECTION
00112  count = 1
00113  DO j = yl_f, yu_f
00114    phi_west_snd(count) = phi_f(xl_f,j)
00115    phi_east_snd(count) = phi_f(xu_f,j)
00116    count = count + 1
00117  END DO
00118  
00119  CALL MPI_IRECV(phi_east_rcv, xsize_f, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, east, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00120  CALL MPI_SEND( phi_west_snd, xsize_f, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, west, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00121  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00122 
00123  CALL MPI_IRECV(phi_west_rcv, xsize_f, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, west, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00124  CALL MPI_SEND( phi_east_snd, xsize_f, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, east, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00125  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00126  
00127 ! Y DIRECTION
00128  count = 1
00129  DO i = xl_f, xu_f
00130    phi_south_snd(count) = phi_f(i,yl_f)
00131    phi_north_snd(count) = phi_f(i,yu_f)
00132    count = count + 1
00133  END DO
00134 
00135  CALL MPI_IRECV(phi_north_rcv, ysize_f, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, north, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00136  CALL MPI_SEND( phi_south_snd, ysize_f, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, south, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00137  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00138 
00139  CALL MPI_IRECV(phi_south_rcv, ysize_f, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, south, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00140  CALL MPI_SEND( phi_north_snd, ysize_f, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, north, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00141  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00142 
00143 ! DIAGONALS
00144  phi_ne_snd = phi_f(xu_f,yu_f)
00145  phi_nw_snd = phi_f(xl_f,yu_f)
00146  phi_sw_snd = phi_f(xl_f,yl_f)
00147  phi_se_snd = phi_f(xu_f,yl_f)
00148 
00149  CALL MPI_IRECV(phi_ne_rcv, 1, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, ne, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00150  CALL MPI_SEND( phi_sw_snd, 1, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, sw, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00151  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00152 
00153  CALL MPI_IRECV(phi_sw_rcv, 1, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, sw, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00154  CALL MPI_SEND( phi_ne_snd, 1, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, ne, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00155  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00156 
00157  CALL MPI_IRECV(phi_se_rcv, 1, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, se, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00158  CALL MPI_SEND( phi_nw_snd, 1, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, nw, TAG1, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00159  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00160 
00161  CALL MPI_IRECV(phi_nw_rcv, 1, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, nw, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_REQ, MPI_ERR)
00162  CALL MPI_SEND( phi_se_snd, 1, MPI_DOUBLE_PRECISION, se, TAG2, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00163  CALL MPI_WAIT(MPI_REQ, status, MPI_ERR)
00164 
00165 !-------- Update all phi values in the ghost nodes -----------------------------
00166 ! X DIRECTION
00167  count = 1
00168  DO j = yl_f, yu_f
00169    phi_f(xug_f,j) = phi_east_rcv(count)
00170    phi_f(xlg_f,j) = phi_west_rcv(count)
00171    count = count + 1
00172  END DO
00173 
00174 ! Y DIRECTION
00175  count = 1
00176  DO i = xl_f, xu_f
00177    phi_f(i,yug_f) = phi_north_rcv(count)
00178    phi_f(i,ylg_f) = phi_south_rcv(count)
00179    count = count + 1
00180  END DO
00181 
00182 ! DIAGONALS
00183  phi_f(xug_f,yug_f) = phi_ne_rcv
00184  phi_f(xlg_f,yug_f) = phi_nw_rcv
00185  phi_f(xlg_f,ylg_f) = phi_sw_rcv
00186  phi_f(xug_f,ylg_f) = phi_se_rcv
00187 
00188  RETURN
00189  END SUBROUTINE PostStreamF
Generated on Sun Jun 15 17:06:41 2008 for ZSC-2D-DGR-MPI by  1.5.6
